org.usfirst.frc.team2220.robot

Class XBoxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
        • org.usfirst.frc.team2220.robot.XBoxController

  • public class XBoxController
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
    The much needed extension of the inadequate Joystick class, XBoxController.
    Keeps track of button states and divides them into onPress, whileHeld, and onRelease.
    Only catch is that XBoxController.update() must be called once per loop
    Author:
    Josh

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XBoxController.Button
      enum for all Button (not axes) types on xbox controller
      static class  XBoxController.POV
      POV enum to treat the POV like a button
      static class  XBoxController.TriggerButton
      Treats the triggers like a button, using 85% pressed as the boundary
